title: Google Drive
content: Can i keep my private documents and files on college google drive. Can they see what i have uploaded and will the drive work even after completing my 4 year

comments.body:
I personally suggest not, i don't know whether they can see it or not tho

I'll let you know and the account post graduation part soon

Q1: They can see everything. Workspace admins have complete control, access, and rights to all data in the Drive.

Q2: Really depends... I still have access a year after graduation... I would still not store anything too important there.

They can see everything you upload but if you Encrypt it before uploading, all they can see is garbage unless they have the password. Try using cryptomator.

P.s- I donâ€™t know if uploading personal files breaks Tos.
Unless it breaks Google TOS it doesn't matter because they're using the free version for education.
